products.name: Walnut Monitor Stand
products.description: Solid walnut construction with cable management slots. Elevates your screen to ergonomic height.

products.name: Brass Desk Lamp
products.description: Adjustable arm with warm LED. Brushed brass finish that develops a natural patina over time.

products.name: Leather Desk Mat
products.description: Full-grain vegetable-tanned leather. Provides a smooth surface for writing and mouse tracking.

products.name: Concrete Pen Holder
products.description: Hand-poured concrete with cork base. Holds up to twelve pens and pencils upright.

products.name: Stackable Filing Trays
products.description: Powder-coated steel with felt pads. Set of three trays that stack or stand alone.

products.name: Cork Pinboard
products.description: Self-healing Portuguese cork in a maple frame. Mounts horizontally or vertically.

products.name: Magnetic Cable Clips
products.description: Silicone-wrapped neodymium magnets. Keeps charging cables tidy and within reach.

products.name: Bamboo Drawer Dividers
products.description: Adjustable spring-loaded dividers that fit drawers from twelve to twenty inches wide.

products.name: Titanium Ballpoint Pen
products.description: CNC-machined titanium body with ceramic ball tip. Accepts standard Parker-style refills.

products.name: Fountain Pen Starter Set
products.description: Includes pen body, converter, and three ink cartridges. Medium nib suitable for everyday writing.

products.name: Mechanical Pencil 0.5mm
products.description: Weighted brass barrel with retractable tip. Built-in sharpener under the cap eraser.

products.name: Archival Ink Set
products.description: Five bottles of fade-resistant, waterproof ink. Colors include black, blue, sepia, green, and red.

products.name: Linen Hardcover Journal
products.description: 192 pages of acid-free, fountain-pen-friendly paper. Lay-flat binding with ribbon bookmark.

products.name: Graph Paper Pad
products.description: Five-millimeter grid on eighty-pound stock. Micro-perforated for clean tear-out.

products.name: Dotted Notebook 3-Pack
products.description: Soft-cover notebooks with five-millimeter dot grid. Ideal for bullet journaling and sketches.

products.name: Premium Sticky Notes
products.description: Repositionable adhesive on heavyweight stock. Six pads in warm neutral tones.
